title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 830.9 - Acceptance of credit cards by common carriers of property or household goods
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 830.9 - Acceptance of credit cards by common carriers of property or household goods

State Regulations
(a) Common carriers
of property or common carriers of household goods may provide in their tariffs
for acceptance of credit cards for the payment of freight charges. (b) Payment by credit card shall be
considered the same as payment by cash, certified check or money order. Any
tariff rule or item permitting the acceptance of credit cards shall identify
the credit card plans participated in by the carrier. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
830.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
